txt.en: 'Good work! It is time to throw ourselves into the fray once again. Perhaps we will meet upon the Hillock!'
Bregdal can be found at Kings' End.\n\nYou should speak with Bregdal.
Bregdal can be found at Riders' Stand.\n\nYou should speak with Bregdal.
Speak with Bregdal when next you meet
'[placeholder], we hold the Hillock for now! We should be able to keep the Enemy at bay from this vantage point for some time. Hope is not lost upon us!'
The Enemy can be found at Kings' End, upon the fields of Pelennor.\n\nDefeat foes at Kings' End.

'We are going to push through the enemy ranks again and make for the Hillock! We could use a distraction so that the full force of the Enemy does not rain down upon us. Defeat some enemies upon the battlefield and lessen their numbers. Then, we shall make our move!'
In the thick of battle upon the fields of Pelennor, Bregdal, Errand-rider of Gondor, hopes to assist you in any way he can.
